alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 16 at 2:28AM PDT until April 16 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Westerly winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Strongest winds will be on ridges, passes, and summits. Blowing dust possible as well. * WHERE...Humboldt County, Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Blowing dust could significantly reduce visibility. Dangerous crosswinds on north to south highways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
